verses.verse: When Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H3423><s%>, and thou succeedest them <S%H3427><s%>, and dwellest in their cities <S%H5892><s%>, and in their houses <S%H1004><s%>;

thou shalt set apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for thee in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Thou shalt prepare <S%H3559><s%> thee the way <S%H1870><s%>, and divide the borders <S%H1366><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> causeth thee to inherit <S%H5157><s%>, into three parts <S%H8027><s%>, that every manslayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee thither <S%H5127><s%>.

And this is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, that shall flee <S%H5127><s%> thither and live <S%H2425><s%>: whoso killeth <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> unawares <S%H1097><s%>, and hated <S%H8130><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>;

as when a man goeth <S%H935><s%> into the forest <S%H3293><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to hew <S%H2404><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetcheth a stroke <S%H5080><s%> with the axe <S%H1631><s%> to cut down <S%H3772><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and the head <S%H1270><s%> slippeth <S%H5394><s%> from the helve <S%H6086><s%>, and lighteth <S%H4672><s%> upon his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, so that he dieth <S%H4191><s%>; he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of these cities <S%H5892><s%> and live <S%H2425><s%>:

lest the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> the manslayer <S%H310><s%>, while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot <S%H3179><s%>, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> him <S%H1870><s%>, because the way is long <S%H7235><s%>, and smite him <S%H5315><s%> mortally <S%H5221><s%>; whereas he was not worthy <S%H4941><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>, inasmuch as <S%H3588><s%> he hated <S%H8130><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>.
Wherefore I command <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H559><s%>, saying, Thou shalt set apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities for thee <S%H5892><s%>.

And if Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> thy border <S%H1366><s%>, as he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> thee all the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>;

if thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> all this commandment <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H6680><s%>, which I command thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> ever <S%H3117><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>; then shalt thou add <S%H3254><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> more for thee <S%H7969><s%>, besides these three:

that innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> be not shed <S%H8210><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of thy land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and so blood be upon thee <S%H1818><s%>.

But if any man <S%H376><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> for him <S%H6965><s%>, and rise up against him <S%H5221><s%>, and smite him mortally <S%H5315><s%> so that he dieth <S%H4191><s%>, and he flee <S%H5127><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>;

then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> him thence <S%H5414><s%>, and deliver him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, that he may die <S%H4191><s%>.

Thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> him <S%H1197><s%>, but thou shalt put away the innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that it may go well with thee <S%H2895><s%>.

Thou shalt not remove <S%H5253><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s landmark <S%H1366><s%>, which they of old time <S%H7223><s%> have set <S%H1379><s%>, in thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which thou shalt inherit <S%H5157><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not rise up <S%H6965><s%> against a man <S%H376><s%> for any iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, or for any sin <S%H2403><s%>, in any sin <S%H2399><s%> that he sinneth <S%H2398><s%>: at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, or at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, shall a matter <S%H1697><s%> be established <S%H6965><s%>.
If an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> against him of wrong-doing <S%H5627><s%>,

then both <S%H8147><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>, between whom the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is <S%H5975><s%>, shall stand before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the judges <S%H8199><s%> that shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>;

and the judges <S%H8199><s%> shall make diligent <S%H3190><s%> inquisition <S%H1875><s%>: and <S%H5707><s%>, behold, if the witness be a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>, and have testified <S%H6030><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>;

then shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> unto him <S%H2161><s%>, as he had thought to do <S%H6213><s%> unto his brother <S%H251><s%>: so shalt thou put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>.

And those that remain <S%H7604><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%>, and shall henceforth <S%H3254><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> no more any <S%H1697><s%> such evil <S%H7451><s%> in the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>.

And thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%>; life <S%H5315><s%> shall go for life <S%H5315><s%>, eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye <S%H5869><s%>, tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth <S%H8127><s%>, hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand <S%H3027><s%>, foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot <S%H7272><s%>.
